text: "This Ain't A Scene, It's an Arms Race" is a single by Fall Out Boy. It is from the album Infinity on High. The song reached number 1 in New Zealand, the United States and Croatia. == Video clip == The video clip starts off with the band finishing performing "Dance, Dance". They then walk off the stage, and one person starts playing "This Ain't a Scene, It's an Arms Race" on their mobile phone MP3 player. They then start performing the song in a recording studio. From the second verse, the band all do separate things. Category:2007 songs Category:Fall Out Boy songs
title: This Ain't a Scene, It's an Arms Race
